column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Oh my goodness
column2: the chicken on a biscuit is perfect. The biscuit is the best biscuit I've ever had probably
column3: which is amazing that I remember that because it had a huge fried chicken slab and smothering of bechamel on top
column4: which were also amazing. The fried chicken was good
column6: but for me the battering was really thick. (The ratio of crust to chicken was 3:2. I'd prefer 1:2 haha - more chicken than crust.)
